homepage.description: HiNan! is a mobile app that makes evacuation drills fun, repeatable, and healthy by walking to nearby shelters based on AI-generated scenarios through gamification.
homepage.feature1Description: Practice realistic evacuation scenarios tailored to your location and environment
homepage.feature2Description: Earn badges and track your progress while making safety training fun
homepage.feature3Description: Combine safety drills with physical exercise by walking to real shelters
homepage.featuresDescription: Turn evacuation drills into an engaging, healthy habit
homepage.tagline: Make evacuation drills a habit by walking
homepage.title: Welcome

metadata.description: HiNan! is a mobile app that makes evacuation drills fun, repeatable, and healthy by walking to nearby shelters based on AI-generated scenarios through gamification.
metadata.title: HiNan! - Make evacuation drills a habit by walking

privacy.changesToPolicyPara1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.changesToPolicyPara2: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacy.commitmentPara1: At HiNan!, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services. We are committed to protecting your data and being transparent about our practices.
privacy.commitmentPara2: By using HiNan!'s services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our services.
privacy.contactResponseTime: Response Time: We aim to respond within 72 hours
privacy.contactUsPara: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, need to report a privacy concern, or want to exercise any of your rights regarding your personal data, please contact us:
privacy.contactUsSubtitle: Questions about our privacy practices or want to exercise your rights?
privacy.dataRetention1: User data is retained as long as your account is active
privacy.dataRetention2: Historical logs are retained for up to 30 days for debugging purposes
privacy.dataRetention3: Inactive accounts are automatically removed after 12 months
privacy.dataRetention4: You can request immediate data deletion by contacting us
privacy.dataSecurity1: All data is transmitted using secure HTTPS connections
privacy.dataSecurity2: Access to sensitive data is restricted to authorized personnel only
privacy.dataSecurity3: Regular security audits and monitoring of our systems
privacy.dataSecurity4: Data is stored securely with industry-standard encryption
privacy.howWeUse3: Improve and optimize app performance and features
privacy.howWeUse4: Monitor system health and troubleshoot technical issues
privacy.infoCollect1: Location data when you use map features (with your permission)
privacy.infoCollect2: Device information (device type, OS version, unique identifiers)
privacy.infoCollect3: Usage data (features used, time spent, interaction patterns)
privacy.infoCollect4: User-generated content (places you save, notes, photos)
privacy.infoSharing1: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes
privacy.infoSharing2: Location data is shared with map providers (Google Maps, Apple Maps) as required for functionality
privacy.infoSharing3: Anonymized usage statistics may be shared for research or improvement purposes
privacy.infoSharing4: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.locationData1: Your location is only collected when you use map-based features
privacy.locationData2: This data helps provide accurate directions and nearby recommendations
privacy.locationData3: Location data is shared with mapping service providers for route calculation
privacy.locationData4: You can disable location access at any time in your device settings
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.yourRights1: Request deletion of your data at any time
privacy.yourRights2: Disable location tracking in your device settings
privacy.yourRights3: Request a copy of the data we have collected about you
privacy.yourRights4: Contact us to correct any inaccurate information

tos.accountTermination1: You may delete your account at any time through the app settings
tos.accountTermination2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts for ToS violations
tos.accountTermination3: Termination does not relieve you of obligations incurred before termination
tos.accountTermination4: Upon termination, your data will be deleted according to our Privacy Policy
tos.agreementPara1: By accessing or using HiNan! mobile application and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. These terms apply to all users of the app, including visitors, registered users, and any other individuals who access the service.
tos.agreementPara2: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our application. Your continued use of HiNan! constitutes acceptance of any changes to these terms.
tos.changesToTermsPara1: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes by posting the new terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
tos.changesToTermsPara2: Your continued use of HiNan! after any changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the new terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must stop using the app.
tos.contactResponseTime: Response Time: We aim to respond within 72 hours
tos.contactUsPara: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service or need clarification on any provisions, please contact us:
tos.contactUsSubtitle: Questions or concerns about these Terms of Service?
tos.governingLawPara1: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Japan, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
tos.governingLawPara2: Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of HiNan! shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the Japan Commercial Arbitration Association.
tos.intellectualProperty1: All content and materials in the app are our property
tos.intellectualProperty2: Trademarks, logos, and service marks are protected
tos.intellectualProperty3: You retain ownership of content you create within the app
tos.intellectualProperty4: By using the app, you grant us a license to use your content for service operation
tos.limitationLiability1: HiNan! is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
tos.limitationLiability2: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
tos.limitationLiability3: Not responsible for losses resulting from unauthorized access to your account
tos.limitationLiability4: Maximum liability limited to the amount you paid for the service (if any)
tos.prohibitedUses1: Using the app for any unlawful or fraudulent purpose
tos.prohibitedUses2: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
tos.prohibitedUses3: Uploading malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
tos.prohibitedUses4: Harassing, threatening, or abusing other users
tos.prohibitedUses5: Scraping or extracting data through automated means
tos.serviceAvailability1: We strive to provide reliable service but cannot guarantee 100% uptime
tos.serviceAvailability2: Maintenance and updates may temporarily interrupt service
tos.serviceAvailability3: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue features
tos.serviceAvailability4: No warranty is provided for uninterrupted or error-free service
tos.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using HiNan!
tos.thirdPartyServices1: The app may contain links to third-party services
tos.thirdPartyServices2: We are not responsible for third-party content or services
tos.thirdPartyServices3: Use of third-party services is subject to their own terms
tos.thirdPartyServices4: Integration with map services (Google Maps, Apple Maps) is provided as-is
tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.useLicense1: Personal, non-commercial use of the application is permitted
tos.useLicense2: You may not modify, copy, or distribute the app without permission
tos.useLicense3: This license may be terminated if you violate any restrictions
tos.useLicense4: All intellectual property rights belong to HiNan!
tos.userObligations2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
tos.userObligations3: Use the app in compliance with all applicable laws
tos.userObligations4: Respect other users and community guidelines
